forum.name: guide
forum.description: the anyland guide with faq, frequently asked questions and their answers! help along, wiki style!

thread.title: proportional resizing

comments.text: if you want to scale a shape but keep its proportions, turn around the create dialog, and click "scale each part uniformly".
you can also resize the whole thing at once during editing by clicking "scale all parts" on the backside.
when resizing a cube with an image and you want to stretch it non-proportionally, use "Disable all snapping" from the me menu's "..." settings.

thread.latestCommentText: when resizing a cube and you want to stretch it non-proportionally, use "Disable all snapping" from the me menu's "..." settings.
